attributes.action: Provide full pay to all hgv drivers if affected by covid 19
attributes.background: Provide hgv drivers with full pay if affected by covid 19 all hgv who do not have sick pay as a option

rejection.details:
We understand that you want HGV drivers affected by COVID-19 to receive full pay, but it's not clear what you want the Government to do to achieve this.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to create a fund for workers affected by COVID-19 to replace lost income.
